Atleast one amount should be greater than zero from Daily, Weekly and Monthly Limits
Use Case ID is a required field.
Weekly limit should be equal to or greater than daily limit.
Monthly limit should be equal to or greater than weekly limit.
Monthly limit should be equal to or greater than daily limit.
